titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the special rules applicable to livestock sold on account of drought will also apply in the case of other natural disasters including excessive moisture.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2070)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to apply the special rule for proceeds from livestock sold on account of drought conditions to livestock sold on account of other natural disasters, including excessive moisture.
